name: ORS Gang Affiliations
description:
This report details information on Gang Affiliations by an Establishment selected at runtime. The report gathers information as entered in the Security>Gangs section of NOMIS. It is possible to select a required wing/houseblock from the prompt at runtime.

PDD0065 v1.0 Last Modified: 01/07/16

dataset.name: Template
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.GANG_CODE AS GANG_CODE, AT_GANGS.GANG_NAME AS GANG_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.COMMENT_TEXT AS COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_GANG_EVIDENCES.GANG_EVIDENCE_CODE AS GANG_EVIDENCE_CODE, AT_REF_GANG_EVIDEN.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_GANG_INVESTS.MEMBERSHIP_STATUS AS MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, AT_OFFENDER_GANG_INVESTS.COMMENT_TEXT AS MEMBERSHIP_COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END || '-' || CASE WHEN AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_GROUP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE AS PROFILE_CODE, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ETHNICITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS, OMS_OWNER.GANGS AT_GANGS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_GANG_EVIDENCES AT_OFFENDER_GANG_EVIDENCES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_REF_GANG_EVIDEN, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_GANG_INVESTS AT_OFFENDER_GANG_INVESTS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = 'ETHNICITY') AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'RELF') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (NOT AT_LIVING_UNITS.HOUSING_UNIT_TYPE IN ('OU', 'REC')) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_GANG_EVIDENCES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.GANG_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_GANG_EVIDENCES.GANG_CODE (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.GANG_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_GANG_INVESTS.GANG_CODE (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_GANG_INVESTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_GANG_EVIDENCES.GANG_EVIDENCE_CODE = AT_REF_GANG_EVIDEN.CODE (+)) AND (AT_REF_GANG_EVIDEN.DOMAIN (+) = 'GANG_EVIDEN') AND (AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.GANG_CODE = AT_GANGS.GANG_CODE (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID =(SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_GANG_AFFILIATIONS.GANG_CODE IS NULL AND (AT_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT AGY_LOC_ID, GANG_CODE, GANG_NAME, COMMENT_TEXT, GANG_EVIDENCE_CODE, DESCRIPTION, MEMBERSHIP_STATUS, MEMBERSHIP_COMMENT_TEXT, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, ETHNIC_GROUP, BIRTH_DATE, PROFILE_CODE, INITIALS, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM dataset_base_)
